metadata.synopsis: The player character comments on having caused a magic allergy reaction from a gremishka.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 43; 24; 34 and trigger a fight the Gremishkas. Use a magic spell near them. The spell is going to trigger the nearby gremishkas' magic allergy feature, after which this PAD is played.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like using magic around these things is more trouble than it's worth!
